title: Iran Khomeini's death led to focus on econ. growth

content.question: Which of the following occurred soon after the death of Ayatollah Ruhollah Khomeini?

choices.label: The government nationalized the financial sector and major industries.
Economic development became the central concern of the Iranian state.
Iran adopted a parliamentary form of government.
Iran reclaimed some of the territory lost to Iraq in the Iran-Iraq War.

content.answer: Economic development became the central concern of the Iranian state.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.2: Political Responses to Global Market Forces

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
